repnme.cdata!:
Egypt - Iron Ore Benefication and
            Engineering Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Bahariya Iron Ore Benefication
            Project will include the following: (i) to carry out a
            feasibility study to identify a beneficiation project for
            Bahariya iron ore and determine its technical and economic
            feasibility; (ii) to carry out a diagnostic study designed
            to identify (a) a rehabilitation and balancing project for
            HADISOLB's productive, ancillary and maintenance
            facilities; (b) a program for strengthening HADISOLB's
            management and improving its operation; and (c) a program
            for improving the iron ore transport facilities from the
            Bahariya area to HADISOLB's plant and for improving
            other infrastructural facilities such as the supply of
            power, natural gas and water; and (iii) to initiate the
            detailed engineering work, including the preparation of
            tender documents, for an iron ore beneficiation project,
            provided that the studies under (i) and (ii) above show this
            project to be viable.
